thread.title: On-air shooting survivor makes 1st public comments
thread.title_full: On-air shooting survivor makes 1st public comments | News24

author: news24.com
title: On-air shooting survivor makes 1st public comments
text:
Virginia - The woman who survived an on-air shooting that killed two TV journalists in Virginia says the gunman never said a word.
In her first public comments since last month's shooting, Smith Mountain Lake Chamber of Commerce executive director Vicki Gardner spoke with Fox News' Greta Van Susteren in an interview broadcast on Tuesday night.
Gardner said that while being interviewed on live TV August 26, she was paying attention to the camera but noticed something down the walkway.
"I just saw movement and then gunfire. Lots and lots of gunfire," Gardner said. "From that point it was very chaotic."
